ModMetaData.name: Faux's Xenotype Icons
ModMetaData.author: Faux
ModMetaData.description:
[i]A collection of HD icons (512 by 512px) for creating new RimWorld xenotypes.[/i]
[h2]Icon Anthologies[/h2] Faux's Xenotype Icons is a standalone mod in the Faux's Icon Anthologies collection. For new collections of variously themed ideology icons, check out the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2906028642]Faux's Complete Icon Anthology collection here[/url] or visit some of the examples below. [list][*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2902019454]Faux's Icon Anthology 01 - Generic[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2903343819]Faux's Icon Anthology 02 - Animals[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2904407795]Faux's Icon Anthology 03 - Winter[/url][/list]
[h2]Future Updates[/h2] Unlike the Icon Anthologies, I will release any new xenotype icons as updates to this mod. If there are specific icons you'd like to see or you have other suggestions, feel free to let me know and I will introduce them in a future update.
[h2]Other Recommended Mods[/h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1678847247]Graphics Settings+[/url] - All the icons should be displayed in crisp HD. If you experience blurriness, this mod should remedy that. This mod will also improve the quality of all other graphics introduced by mods and is a good companion to the Icon Anthologies.
